member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.BrightExtractEffect
member.summary: Adjust the image brightness based on the given threshold.

member.summary: Gets or sets an optional brush that represents the result of this effect. This is a dependency property.
member.value: A System.Windows.Media.Brush that specifies the optional result of this effect. Default value is null (**Nothing** in VB).

member.summary: Gets or sets brightness threshold. This is a dependency property.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CircularShutterEffect
member.summary: Creates a circular or elliptical shutter effect by using a center point, radius, aspect ratio and a color to clear the area outside the shutter.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CircularShutterEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CircularShutterEffect class.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CircularShutterEffect.AspectRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets aspect ratio of the shutter. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The aspect ratio of the shutter. This value is multiplied by the Radius value to generate an elliptical shutter. Default value is 1.5.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CircularShutterEffect.Center
member.summary: Gets or sets center of the shutter. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The center of the shutter. The value is a percentage of the image size. Default value is 0.5, 0.5.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CircularShutterEffect.ClearColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color to use to clear the area outside the shutter. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The color to use to clear the area outside the shutter. Default value is a solid Black color.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CircularShutterEffect.Input
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional brush that represents the result of this effect. This is a dependency property.
member.value: A System.Windows.Media.Brush that specifies the optional result of this effect. Default value is null (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CircularShutterEffect.Radius
member.summary: Gets or sets the radius of the shutter. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The radius of the shutter. The value is a percentage of the image size. Default value is 0.25.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CircularShutterEffect.AspectRatioProperty
member.summary: Identifies the AspectRatio dependency property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CircularShutterEffect.CenterProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Center dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the ClearColor dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the Input dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the Radius dependency property.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.MagnifyGlassEffect
member.summary: Creates an effect that can be used to zoom in on a portion of an image with options to specify size, shape and color of the magnify glass and crosshairs.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.MagnifyGlassEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MagnifyGlassEffect class.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.MagnifyGlassEffect.AspectRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets aspect ratio of the magnify glass. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The aspect ratio of the magnify glass. This value is multiplied by the Radius value to generate an elliptical magnify glass. Default value is 1.5.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.MagnifyGlassEffect.Border
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to draw the border of this magnify glass. This is a dependency property.
member.value: 1.0 to draw the border; otherwise, hide it. Default value is 1.0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.MagnifyGlassEffect.Center
member.summary: Gets or sets center of the magnify glass. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The center of the magnify glass. The valus is a percentage of the image size. Default value is 0.5, 0.5.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.MagnifyGlassEffect.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the color to use to draw the border and crosshairs of this magnify glass. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The color to use to draw the border and crosshairs of this magnify glass. Default value is White.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.MagnifyGlassEffect.CrossHairs
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to draw the crosshairs of this magnify glass. This is a dependency property.
member.value: 1.0 to draw the crosshairs; otherwise, hide it. Default value is 1.0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.MagnifyGlassEffect.Input
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional brush that represents the result of this effect. This is a dependency property.
member.value: A System.Windows.Media.Brush that specifies the optional result of this effect. Default value is null (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.MagnifyGlassEffect.Radius
member.summary: Gets or sets the radius of the magnify glass. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The radius of the magnify glass. The value is a percentage of the image size. Default value is 0.25.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.MagnifyGlassEffect.ScaleFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of the scale factor to use in this magnify glass. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The amount of the scale factor to use in this magnify glass. Default value is 2.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.MagnifyGlassEffect.AspectRatioProperty
member.summary: Identifies the AspectRatio dependency property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.MagnifyGlassEffect.BorderProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Border dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the Center dependency property.

member.summary: Increases or decreases the sharpness of this image.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SharpenEffect class.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.SharpenEffect.Amount
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount to change the sharpness. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The amount to change the sharpness.Negative sharpness values decrease the sharpness of the image and positive sharpness values increase the sharpness. Default value is 1.

member.summary: Gets or sets an optional brush that represents the result of this effect. This is a dependency property.
member.value: A System.Windows.Media.Brush that specifies the optional result of this effect. Default value is null (**Nothing** in VB).

member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the optional brush that represents the result of this effect. This is a dependency property.

member.summary: Fills and applies window leveling on the specified image.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the WindowLevelEffect class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the WindowLevelEffect class with the specified parameters.
member.param: The LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage containing the grayscale image.

member.summary: Helper method to create the grayscale brush required by this effect from a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage.
member.returns: An System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush object containing the grayscale texture.

member.summary: Occurs when the value of the CurveType property changes.
member.param: A System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.WindowLevelEffect.CurveType
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the range is used to fill the LUT and the type of LUT. This is a dependency property.
member.value: An CurveType enumeration member that specifies how the range is used to fill the LUT and the type of LUT. Default value is CurveType.Linear.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.WindowLevelEffect.End
member.summary: Gets or sets the ending color value for the gradient. This is a dependency property.
member.value: a System.Windows.Media.Color that specifies the ending color value for the gradient. Default value is White.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.WindowLevelEffect.Factor
member.summary: Gets or sets the factor to be applied in the function operation specified in CurveType. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The factor to be applied in the function operation specified in CurveType. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.WindowLevelEffect.GrayTexture
member.summary: Gets or sets the gray texture to use with this effect. This is a dependency property.
member.value: A System.Windows.Media.Brush that specifies the gray texture to use with this effect. Default value is null (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.WindowLevelEffect.Input
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional brush that represents the result of this effect. This is a dependency property.
member.value: A System.Windows.Media.Brush that specifies the optional result of this effect. Default value is null (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.WindowLevelEffect.Start
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting color value for the gradient. This is a dependency property.
member.value: a System.Windows.Media.Color that specifies the starting color value for the gradient. Default value is Black.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.WindowLevelEffect.WindowCenter
member.summary: Gets or sets the center of the window used in this effect. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The center of the window used in this effect. Default value is 32768.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.WindowLevelEffect.WindowWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the window used in this effect. This is a dependency property.
member.value: The width of the window used in this effect. Default value is 65536.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CurveType
member.summary: Options to specify how the range is used to fill the LUT and the type of LUT.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CurveType.Linear
member.summary: LUT is leaner

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CurveType.Logarithmic
member.summary: LUT is logarithmic.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CurveType.Exponential
member.summary: LUT is exponential.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Effects.CurveType.Sigmoid
member.summary: LUT is sigmoid.
